statements: SELECT * FROM learning_paths;
SELECT path_id, student_id, course_id FROM learning_paths WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT path_id, student_id, course_id, completion_status FROM learning_paths WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM learning_paths WHERE interest_tags = 'programming';
SELECT path_id, student_id, course_id, interest_tags FROM learning_paths ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM learning_paths WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT student_id, course_id FROM learning_paths WHERE path_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM learning_paths WHERE interest_tags LIKE '%programming%';
SELECT path_id, course_id FROM learning_paths WHERE student_id = 10 ORDER BY path_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_paths FROM learning_paths WHERE completion_status = FALSE GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT * FROM personal_learning_paths;
SELECT student_id, learning_path_name FROM personal_learning_paths ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT AVG(performance_score) AS avg_score FROM personal_learning_paths;
SELECT * FROM interests;
SELECT student_id, interest_name FROM interests WHERE student_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM personal_learning_paths WHERE performance_score > 80 ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, learning_path_name FROM personal_learning_paths WHERE performance_score BETWEEN 70 AND 90 ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT student_id, interest_name FROM interests WHERE interest_name LIKE 'Math%' ORDER BY student_id;
SELECT student_id, interest_name FROM interests WHERE student_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY student_id ASC;
SELECT AVG(performance_score) AS avg_score, COUNT(*) AS total_students FROM personal_learning_paths;
SELECT student_name, performance_score FROM students WHERE performance_score > 80;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id = 3;
SELECT student_name, performance_score FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT interest, student_id FROM student_interests WHERE interest = 'Programming';
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, performance_score FROM students WHERE performance_score > 80 ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, interest FROM students JOIN student_interests ON students.student_id = student_interests.student_id;

SELECT course_name, COUNT(*) AS total_students FROM students JOIN student_interests ON students.student_id = student_interests.student_id JOIN courses ON student_interests.interest = courses.course_name GROUP BY course_name;
SELECT AVG(performance_score) AS average_score, COUNT(*) AS total_students FROM students;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, student_grade, learning_path FROM students WHERE student_grade > 80;
SELECT student_name, interests FROM students WHERE ARRAY_LENGTH(interests) > 0;
SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM students s JOIN student_progress sp ON s.student_id = sp.student_id JOIN courses c ON sp.course_id = c.course_id;
SELECT course_name, course_duration, prerequisites FROM courses WHERE course_duration > 6 ORDER BY course_duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_grade > 10 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, interests FROM students WHERE learning_path = 'Data Science';
SELECT course_name, course_duration FROM courses WHERE required_grade <= 12 AND course_duration > 6;

SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM students JOIN student_progress ON students.student_id = student_progress.student_id JOIN courses ON student_progress.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE completion_date IS NULL;

SELECT interests.interest_name, count(*) as interest_count FROM students JOIN interests ON interests.interest_id = ANY(students.interests) GROUP BY interests.interest_name ORDER BY interest_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM students WHERE student_grade='A';
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, interest_category FROM students INNER JOIN interests ON students.student_id = interests.student_id;
SELECT student_name, path_name FROM students INNER JOIN learning_paths ON students.student_id = learning_paths.student_id WHERE path_name LIKE '%Programming%';
SELECT * FROM students
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM students WHERE student_id = 1
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses ORDER BY course_name DESC
SELECT student_name, course_name, score FROM students JOIN performances ON students.student_id = performances.student_id JOIN courses ON performances.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE score > 80
SELECT student_name, interest_category FROM students JOIN interests ON students.student_id = interests.student_id WHERE interest_category = 'Programming'
